short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps ADHD sufferers read faster and focus better by applying bionic reading techniques to web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SwiftSight is a Chrome extension that makes reading easier by applying customizable bionic reading techniques to web pages. It works by bolding a portion of each word, with an adjustable intensity slider to match your reading preference. Transform entire pages with a single click, or use the context menu to convert selected text. Features include a customization popup, persistent settings, and right-click menu integration. Designed to help readers with ADHD and anyone looking to improve their reading speed and focus.
